actions.text: On agreeing to the Young (FL) amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 351 - 58 (Roll no. 571).

description: Amendment provides $1.825 billion for implementation of the President's request for the Wye River Accord and also increases funding for other programs by $799.1 million.
purpose: An amendment to provide $1.825 billion to fully fund the President's request for the Wye River Accord and increase funding for other programs by $799.1 million.
